00033 
00042 class SURFIT_EXPORT grid_line : public data {
00043 public:
00050         grid_line(int * ifirst_begin,  int * ifirst_end,
00051                   int * isecond_begin, int * isecond_end);
00052 
00054         ~grid_line();
00055 
00056         virtual bool bounds(REAL & minx, REAL & maxx, REAL & miny, REAL & maxy) const;
00057 
00059         int size() const;
00060 
00062         void add(int *& ifirst_begin,  int *& ifirst_end,
00063                  int *& isecond_begin, int *& isecond_end);
00064         
00066         void add(grid_line * line);
00067 
00068         virtual bool getMinMaxZ(REAL & minz, REAL & maxz) const;
00069 
00071         void sort();
00073         void compress();
00074 
00076         int * first_begin;
00078         int * first_end;
00080         int * second_begin;
00082         int * second_end;
00083 
00085         int ** sort_by_first_begin;
00087         int ** sort_by_first_end;
00089         int ** sort_by_second_begin;
00091         int ** sort_by_second_end;
00092 };
